summary: He was recovering at home, not in a hospital, and would have made arrangements to vote.

statements.quote: With one Yes vote in hospital & very positive signs from Alaska and two others (McCain is out), we have the HCare Vote, but not for Friday!

Well, Pete, the healthcare plan didn't go down. We have the votes, but reconciliation is a disaster, but as you know it ends on Friday, so we don't have enough time because we have one senator who is a yes vote -- a great person -- but he's in the hospital, and he's a yes vote, so we can't do it by Friday. So we have the votes, we will do it sometime at the beginning of the year, but to the election in November.

I just wanted to say, though, on healthcare, we have the votes for healthcare. We have one senator that's in the hospital. He can't vote because he’s in the hospital. He can't vote because he’s in the hospital. We have two other votes that are coming, and we will have them. But the problem is we can't have them by Friday -- because the reconciliation ends on Friday.

name: Thad Cochran couldn't vote on a healthcare bill since he was in the hospital
